About

I'm a full stack developer that's worked primarily doing front end development on a react native health tech app. I'm using this space online to write about code, what I am learning and what I am experimenting with. The main point of this is to get a better understanding of what I'm coding and be able to articulate the technical skills that I do have.

I'm a firm believer in continuous improvement and take time out daily to practice the language I write best in through leetcode and building my own projects.

I write at medium here.

My current goals are to contribute to open source and work full time on a software project.
